plugin-data.name: RSS Feed 2
plugin-data.description:
Creates an RSS web syndication feed of your site.
URL: http://example.com/rss2.xml

rss-feed-copyright-tip:
More information about copyright licenses.
Default is "CC By-SA 4.0". Leave blank to disable.
rss-feed-generator-tip:
A string indicating the program used to generate the channel.
Default is "Bludit - Flat-File CMS". Leave blank to disable.
rss-feed-item-limit-tip: Maximum number of items in RSS Feed. Default is "10".
rss-feed-ttl-tip:
ttl stands for "time to live". Number of minutes before feed reader refreshes rss feed.
Default is "60". Leave blank to disable.
rss-feed-url-tip: URL that people use to subscribe to your RSS Feed.
